PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: P3 exhibited the highest PCE value of 5.61% among all polymers , including P1 and P7 , which was attributed to the broad absorption and increased V OC due to the deeper HOMO energy level.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE value |
| P1 |
| P7 |
| HOMO energy level |

In this paragraph, the following entities are referred to as "Property Name":

* PCE value: This refers to the percentage of photocatalytic activity of the polymers.
* P1: This is a specific polymer whose PCE value is being compared to that of P3.
* P7: This is another specific polymer whose PCE value is being compared to that of P3.
* HOMO energy level: This refers to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) in the polymers.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Property Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE value |
| HOMO energy level |

In this paragraph, the following entities are referred to as "Property Name":

* PCE value: This refers to the percentage of photocatalytic activity of the polymers.
* HOMO energy level: This refers to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) in the polymers.
